original_text: So Ebed-Melech took the men with him. He went to a room in the palace where they stored valuable things. He took some old clothes and pieces of cloth from there. He tied them to the end of some ropes. Then he let them drop down into the deep hole where Jeremiah was.
korean_text: 에벳멜렉이 사람들을 데리고 왕궁 곳간 밑 방에 들어가서 거기에서 헝겊과 낡은 옷을 가져다가 그것을 구덩이에 있는 예레미야에게 밧줄로 내리며

sentences.original_text: So Ebed-Melech took the men with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 에벳-멜렉은 그 사람들을 데리고 갔다.

sentences.original_text: He went to a room in the palace
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 궁전에 있는 한 방으로 갔다.

sentences.original_text: and pieces of cloth from there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 헌 천 조각들을 가져왔다.

sentences.original_text: He tied them to the end of some ropes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들을 몇 개의 밧줄 끝에 묶었다.

sentences.original_text: Then he let them drop down
into the deep hole where Jeremiah was.
